Comments.Message:
Per [this](https://csd.codeplex.com/discussions/459444) discussion a beta version for VS 2013 is available [here](https://skydrive.live.com/?cid=26C51FBA2140CA25&id=26C51FBA2140CA25%21493). I tried it out and it seems to work as advertised.

Sean

Support for VS 2013 has been added by iLMax. It should be added to the downloads section soon, but for now, you can take it from a link posted by IlMax in another thread.

[TEXT](https://skydrive.live.com/?cid=26C51FBA2140CA25&id=26C51FBA2140CA25%21493)
I just noticed that SeanJSeymour already posted this, so check out the links in his post.
I will finish implementation and ask the project leader to deploy on visual studio gallery.
Ahh.. The VS gallery... It's not a fun place to deploy updates.  I will need to provide Max with the gallery login credentials for this tool. I'll look it up.

Of course, the VS Gallery strikes again. Email address expired and was deleted. I recreated it with SAME name and password. Now, VS Gallery refuses to link up the re-created email address. We may need to create a new project page for this extension on the vs gallery site...

I agree whe should create a different page even since is impossible to upload multiple extension that support different editions of visual studio on the same page. Usually the pattern is :
My Supercool extension : only support VS2012
My Supercool extension 2013 only support VS2013

and so on.

I uploaded a package for VS 2013 (see downloads). This release also attempts to resolve some issues related to "invalid GUID" or "not a vs project". It has received limited testing, so please report issues.
